metadata.name: Potential Memory Dumping Activity Via LiveKD
metadata.comment: Detects execution of LiveKD based on PE metadata or image name

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\livekd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\livekd64.exe'))) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('livekd.exe'))

output.summary: Detects execution of LiveKD based on PE metadata or image name

metadata.objective: False positive: Administration and debugging activity (must be investigated) Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/livekd
